é‡‘å¥

  • â€œI think that there's a tremendous opportunity right now to go actually against AI and do just a lot of IRL stuff.â€
  • â€œJust go the opposite way and you're going to find that a lot of people want exactly that.â€
  • â€œIn-person incredible.â€
  • â€œIn-person events actually have a limited amount of tickets. And so it's way easier to create a true sense of urgency and scarcity because it just is inherent to in person.â€
  • â€œwhat do people want because people will just say, 'I want digital stuff and I want it to be easy.' It's what do people need?â€
  • â€œAI can generate all of our content, but it cannot generate new versions of us coming to your office.â€
  • â€œIt feels more legit... This is not some cave dweller who's going to steal all my money. It's actually a real person who goes out into the real world and and meets the customers.â€
  • â€œI don't have an audience, but I still like you know the there's this concept of the uh 1,000 true fans. Well, I have like the 100 true fans or the 10 true fans. Um and that's all you need if especially for in person.â€
